name: Slider Options – Manager jQuery Slider
author: Simon Jan

sections.description:
If We Have a Option Slider, We Can use Slider Options Manager it by Drag and Drop. ðŸ˜‰

Features:

  • Drag and Reorder Slides
  • Upload/Delete image
  • Add Hyperlinks to Slides
  • Set Link Target for Each Slide
  • Shortcode Support
  • Video ( Youtube or Vimeo Video,… ) as Slides
  • Internalization Support
  • Customization Your Option: animation, caption, responsive, control buton, …
  • Use minify resources

Feedback

  • I am open for your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying out one of my plugins!
  • Can you post the issue that you’re having to support forum or send me a message to buidinhtho27@gmail.com, thanks.
sections.installation:
1. Upload your plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Look at your admin bar and enjoy using the new Menu item (SM Slider)
